price: 29. Dijeron (arrepentidos): “¡Glorificado sea Al-lah!, hemos sido injustos”.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
